post.description: Add new pet to the store inventory.

put.summary: Add a new pet to the store

petstore_auth.description:
Get access to data while protecting your account credentials.
OAuth2 is also a safer and more secure way to give you access.

scopes.api: Grants complete read/write access to the API, including all groups and projects, the container registry, and the package registry.
scopes.read_user: Grants read-only access to the authenticated user's profile through the /user API endpoint, which includes username, public email, and full name. Also grants access to read-only API endpoints under /users.
scopes.read_api: Grants read access to the API, including all groups and projects, the container registry, and the package registry.
scopes.read_repository: Grants read-only access to repositories on private projects using Git-over-HTTP or the Repository Files API.

scopes.read_user: Grants read-only access to the authenticated user's profile through the /user API endpoint, which includes username, public email, and full name. Also grants access to read-only API endpoints under /users.
